org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction

Interface TransactionListener


  • public interface TransactionListener
    A Listener for Transaction Events. Transaction listeners are notified upon major events in a transaction lifecycle, i.e. Commit and Revert.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TransactionEvent(TransactionEventObject event)
      Signals a transaction event.

    • Method Detail

      • TransactionEvent

        void TransactionEvent(TransactionEventObject event)
        Signals a transaction event. The event object describes the event.
        Parameters:
        event -
